description:
Discover the freedom of paddling. This compact 3-person canoe is easy to handle, with a shallow arch bottom and wide beam that is stable on lakes or mellow rivers. The triple-layer plastic hull is the type of strong that you wouldn't want to portage, but withstands the abuse of the boniest rivers and shorelines. Besides being durable, the plastic hull is pretty much maintenance free, leaving you more time to explore local waterways or take in the sunset from the best seat in the house.

  • Made of durable triple-layer polyethylene
  • Vinyl gunwales for maximum durability
  • Seat is nylon laced ash
  • Comfortable carrying handles
  • Oar sockets allow you to row it from the centre or forward seats
name: Old Town Discovery 133
